## Loading and preprocessing the data
```{r echo=TRUE, results='hide', message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
data<-read.csv("activity.csv")
data$Date<-as.Date(data$date, format="%Y-%m-%d")
```

## What is mean total number of steps taken per day?
```{r echo=TRUE}
stepsPerDay<-xtabs(steps ~ Date, data=data)
hist(stepsPerDay)
mean(stepsPerDay)
median(stepsPerDay)
```

## What is the average daily activity pattern?
```{r echo=TRUE}
data1<-data %>% group_by(interval) %>% summarize(totalSteps=sum(steps, na.rm=TRUE))
nDays<-length(unique(data$Date))
plot(data1$totalSteps/nDays, type="l", ylab="Average Steps Per Interval",
     xlab="5 Minute Interval")
```

## Imputing missing values
```{r echo=TRUE}
sum(is.na(data$steps))
data1<-data %>% 
    group_by(interval) %>% 
    summarize(meanSteps=mean(steps, na.rm=TRUE))
data2<-merge(data, data1)
data2$steps<-ifelse(is.na(data2$steps), data2$meanSteps, data2$steps)
data3<-data2 %>% 
    group_by(interval) %>% 
    summarize(sumSteps=sum(steps, na.rm=TRUE))
plot(data3$sumSteps/nDays, type="l", ylab="Average Steps Per Interval",
     xlab="5 Minute Interval")
```

## Are there differences in activity patterns between weekdays and weekends?
```{r echo=TRUE}
data$weekday<-weekdays(data$Date) %in% c("Saturday", "Sunday")
data$dayType<-factor(data$weekday, labels = c("weekday", "weekend"))

par(mfrow=c(2,1))
par(mar=c(2, 4, 0, 2))
dataWeekdays<-data[which(data$dayType == "weekday"), ]
dataWeekdays1<-dataWeekdays %>% 
    group_by(interval) %>% 
    summarize(totalSteps=sum(steps, na.rm=TRUE))
nWeekdays<-length(unique(dataWeekdays$Date))
plot(dataWeekdays1$totalSteps/nWeekdays, type="l", ylab="Weekday Steps",
     xlab="5 Minute Interval")

dataWeekend<-data[which(data$dayType == "weekend"), ]
dataWeekend1<-dataWeekend %>% 
    group_by(interval) %>% 
    summarize(totalSteps=sum(steps, na.rm=TRUE))
nWeekend<-length(unique(dataWeekend$Date))
plot(dataWeekend1$totalSteps/nWeekend, type="l", ylab="Weekend Steps",
     xlab="5 Minute Interval")
```
